text: Constantin Drăgănescu (27 September 1936 – 26 March 2020) was a Romanian actor. He appeared in more than fifty films since 1972. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! title: Constantin Drăgănescu
